cast.name: 叶林娜·沃什卡 Elina Vaska

introduction: A social contradiction is encapsulated in the opening image: a woman sunbathing on a rooftop is revealed to be located, incongruously, right above a busy office in Riga. Then the action shifts to a beach, where the same tension is evident: work is repetitive and unglamorous, while a self-help audio promises peace and contentment.Anna Ansone’s poignant, witty portrait asks: what’s the point of such fantasy in a world that forbids us to change?源自：https://iffr.com/en/iffr/2023/films/cant-help-myself
